phrases: Just lie quietly and become fodder!
l just do not use Tetsusaiga, right?
l just need one arm to deal with that disgusting demon!
I hold Kagome's life in my hand!
Otherwise, Kagome will not be able to hang on.
Whether Inuyasha wins or loses, Tsubaki intends to kill Kagome.
The only way is to break Tsubaki's curse.
or we destroy her messenger demon spirit, Shikikami.
she said she was bitten by something.
Yes, that was probably the messenger demon of the Dark Priestess.
It had to have been that snake.
If you resist me, Kagome's suffering will be prolonged.
Or, it is so easy to do...
Shall I send Kagome to the netherworld now?
I will wake up in a minute.
Wake up or you will be late for school.
How long're you going to stay in bed?
Why am I back in this world?
Cannot you at least say a morning greeting?
Say, when did I come back here?
When I enter that old hidden well,
I enter the civil war era where there are oodles of demons.
I have come and gone so many times already!
Remember, the one that has dog ears.
Sis, maybe you should stay home from school today.
You remember my boyfriend, do not you?
It was not a dream, after all!
It is Hojo in Group B, right?
Remember... the jealous, rough, spoiled one...
Kagome, you sure go for it.
but I have suddenly been thrust back into my old life.
Entrance exams are coming up soon.
Yes, I am supposed to study for exams.
I heard you were feeling down.
It is good for your health.
Grandma, buy me a sacred jewel keyholder.
Now then, the origin of the Sacred Jewel is said...
Buyo... something is wrong with me.
So many things are going round and round in my head.
I feel like I was supposed to do something.
All the things I should remember are getting so mixed up.
I just have this feeling that what I am doing now is wrong.
But... what am I supposed to do?
This pain that I feel sometimes...
I am getting used to it.
And I do not worry about it much.
Is not that why you are here?
As it is, you will end up killing Inuyasha yet again.
I must get out of this world!
You have decided who you are.
You have managed to endure my curse.
Well, I guess being Kikyo's reincarnation was not a lie, after all.
Although, if you were the REAL Kikyo, that arrow would not have missed.
So you are just an imitation Kikyo.
Kagome will not last like this!
Hang on for just a bit longer.
I have had enough of you two!
I will never let her kill you!
You are in the way, creep!
Do you think the curse has been broken?
She is not recovering... even though the Shikikami has been destroyed.
She still had more demons inside her!
Bite off that woman's head and get the Sacred Jewel shards from her!
I will not lose to you!
She reversed the curse to me!
Why must I be done in by that young twit?
The Shikon Jewel is beginning to purify!
You are going to let it go...
I will get it back right away.
I must give the Dark Priestess a chance for revenge.
No thanks to them... the demons have all died.
But as long as I have a Sacred Jewel this large...
I will be able to increase my powers immensely.
Next time, I will get you...
You shall pay, Inuyasha and Kagome!
She fought the spell for so long.
All because you are with me...
I want to stay with you.
Does the Dark Priestess Tsubaki still possess the Sacred Jewel?
But the Red Priestess and the White Priestess...
I am tricking Kagome and Miroku and the others?
Next on Inuyasha: The Red and White Priestesses
